00005 #include "AbstractCell.h"

00007 #ifndef ConwayCell_h
00008 #define ConwayCell_h
00009 
00010 class ConwayCell : public AbstractCell {
00011 
00012     public:
00013         ConwayCell (char c) : AbstractCell(c) {
00014             if (c == '*') {
00015                 life = true;
00016             } else {
00017                 life = false;
00018                 assert(c == '.');
00019             }
00020         }
00021 
00022         ConwayCell* clone () const {
00023             return new ConwayCell(*this);
00024         }
00025 
00026         char get() const {
00027             return (life) ? '*' : '.';
00028         }
00029 
00030         void eval() {
00031             assert(neighbors >= 0 && neighbors <= 8);
00032             // a live cell becomes a dead cell, if less than 2 or more than 3
00033             // neighbors are alive
00034             if (life && (neighbors < 2 || neighbors > 3)) {
00035                 life = false;
00036             // a dead cell becomes a live cell, if exactly 3 neighbors are alive
00037             } else if (!life && neighbors == 3) {
00038                 life = true;
00039             }
00040         }
00041 
00042         void conwayInc() {
00043             neighbors++;
00044         }
00045 
00046         void incNeighbors() {
00047             ++neighbors;
00048         }
00049 
00050         void setNeighbors(int n) {
00051             neighbors = n;
00052         }
00053 };
00054 
00055 #endif // ConwayCell_h
